summary: An email chain containing an Uber receipt for a trip from Los Angeles International Airport to a meeting with "the Epstein team" on November 14, 2019. The sender forwards the receipt, indicating it was for work travel related to Epstein.

persons.name: Sung
persons.context: The Uber driver who provided the ride from LAX to a meeting with the Epstein team.

events.title: Uber trip to Epstein team meeting
events.description: An individual took an Uber from Los Angeles International Airport (6365 Sky Way, Los Angeles, CA) to 1717 4th St, Santa Monica, CA, for a meeting with "the Epstein team" for work.

locations: 6365 Sky Way, Los Angeles, CA (Los Angeles International Airport)
1455 Market St, San Francisco, CA 94103 (Uber Technologies headquarters)
keyFacts: The document is an Uber receipt for a trip taken on November 14, 2019.
The trip purpose was a "meeting with the Epstein team" for work-related travel.
The trip originated at Los Angeles International Airport and ended at 1717 4th St, Santa Monica, CA.
The document date (November 15, 2019) is after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019, indicating ongoing activities or meetings associated with his team.
The email is part of the Epstein case document release, suggesting the trip was relevant to investigations or legal proceedings.
